attributes.action: ‘Reciprocal Press Credential Arrangements for UK Journalists in Israel’.
attributes.additional_details:
‘We the undersigned call on the UK Government to take action on behalf of UK Journalists Martin & Nathalie Blackham with the Israeli Government regarding their renewal of Israeli Press Credentials.

We believe that British Journalists in Israel holding full UK Police Press Credentials are entitled to reciprocal arrangements with the Israeli General Press Office for the provision of Israeli Press Credentials’.
